requirement.topic: Allows Java clients to ping xmlBlaster, to test reliable the connection.
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster interface has a ping method. This allows checking the CORBA/RMI/XmlRpc connection. The Java XmlBlasterConnection class uses this ping (if in fail save mode) and starts login polling if the ping fails. Use method XmlBlasterConnection.initFailSave() to activate the ping feature and set the ping interval. Note that this is a pure client behavior, and for the moment the only reference implementation is in Java.
